title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 8 September 2025 through Monday, 15 September 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +3, -0

Support increases (3)

API

  1. api ➞ Document ➞ ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ Element ➞ ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ input ➞ type_color ➞ accepts_css_colors
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 19

Show all 19 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (10)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 5 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ toJSON
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ auto
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ ideograph-alpha
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ ideograph-numeric
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ no-autospace
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  5. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ normal
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  6. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ insert
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  7. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ punctuation
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  8. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ replace
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Supports-Loading-Mode ➞ fenced-frame
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

New entries (6)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 5 September 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api ➞ Document ➞ ariaNotify
  2. api ➞ Element ➞ ariaNotify

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ insert
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ punctuation
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ text-autospace ➞ replace

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Supports-Loading-Mode ➞ fenced-frame

Removed entries (3)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Friday, 5 September 2025, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

API

  1. api ➞ FederatedCredential ➞ iconURL
  2. api ➞ FederatedCredential ➞ name

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Supports-Loading-Mode ➞ fenced-frames
  • Previous report: Monday, 8 September 2025

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

BCD Metadata Changes: 37

Show all 37 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (7)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Saturday, 9 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

New entries (30)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Saturday, 9 August 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.
